title: Microsoft vs Avalara | Offer
content:
Education: BE tier 2
Years of Experience: 4 years
previous experience: service based company
current compensation: 12.5 fixed 

Company: Microsoft 
Title/Level: software engineer (L61)
Team: Azure
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 25L (fixed)
bonus: 0 to 20% performance based 
Relocation Bonus: 3.8L
Stock bonus: 40k USD/4years
Joining Bonus: 0
Total compensation = 25+2.5(avg 10% bonus)+ 8.3L stocks = 35.8L

Company: Avalara
Title/Level: senior software 25 engineer (SSE)
Location: Pune (but it would be remote eventually)
Salary: 29L (fixed)
bonus: 10% fixed bonus = 2.9L
Relocation bonus: 3.8L
Joining Bonus: 0
Total compensation = 29+2.9 = 31.9L

which offer/company sounds better in terms of compensation, growth opportunities, wlb etc?
Should I negotiate with Avalara for a better compensation?
Any tips to negotiate with MS considering I have already accepted the offer?
